wikipedia_page.main: William Albert Robertson,  (6 September 1885 – 26 March 1942) was a Scottish rugby union international, a distinguished doctor and a decorated soldier. He was part of the first official British Isles team that toured South Africa in 1910. Although he played for the Lions, he was never selected to play for Scotland.

response: *William Albert Robertson (1885–1942), Scottish rugby union international, doctor and soldier
